messages.message:
Two pieces of feedback following the release of multistep as I was creating the video.

• Could we make it possible to delete a single question plus answer? Right now you can only clear the whole chat.
• Could I share / download a conversation rather than just individual questions, or select the questions & answers I want to export
With the new organization feature, I can imagine workflows where a manager says to an analyst - go do some analysis on these docs. The analyst goes into AI Hub, finetunes prompts, and then shares the output (in a word doc) along with a link to the conversation in AI Hub to allow the manager to audit. It positions Converse much more as a co-pilot in team workflows.

Thanks for sharing the feedback, @Bas

Couple of followup questions:
• How would deletion of specific Q and answer be useful for you? Are there specific instances where you feel this need? 
• Sharing / download of a conversation has been a commonly requested feature, and part of our backlog. Do you see the primary need as collaboration with other team members through a ‘shared edit access’, or are there cases in which a ‘read only access’ would also be useful? FYI, we are prioritising published conversations via chat bots in Q4 which would help address this need partly

The idea being that if I’m working in a team, and my manager has asked me to do some analysis, I’d like to be able to share the conversation with her/him and clean that up from any test or faulty prompts I have done.

I think it would need to be important for a manager to be able see steps and sources / provenance for the responses.

(It is also very useful when doing video editing, but that’s another issue :joy: )
